com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice

Interface CompoundSearchQuery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Query, XMLSerializable

    public interface CompoundSearchQuery
extends Query
    A compound query is a set of queries combined by a logical operator.

    Currently either AND or OR are supported, with the obvious semantics.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CompoundSearchQuery.Operator
      Ways to connect the terms of a compound query.
